mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (userid, userpw, nickname, social_type) VALUES (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{nickname}, 'LOCAL')
mapper.select: SELECT userid, userpw, nickname, user_point as userPoint, user_rank as userRank FROM tbl_member WHERE userid = #{userid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND userpw = #{userpw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
